p: SARS-CoV-2 primarily targets the lungs, the vasculatures, and the immune system [ 33]. The initial step of the viral multiplication is the binding to the surface of respiratory cells mediated by the spike (S) viral protein [ 34]. It had been speculated that SARS-CoV-2 likely utilize angiotensin- converting enzyme 2 (ACE2, EC 3.4.17.23) of various mammals, except murines and a few birds, such as pigeon [ 35].
